data.description:
Looking for a way to rock out without waking the neighbors? Look no further than Air Drums! This free game drops you into a cool 70s garage in space, with drumsticks attached to your hands and no instructions to hold you back. 

While the hand tracking may not be perfect for drumming to songs, it's still incredibly fun to smash around and play with for short bursts of time. Plus, our high-quality environment and physics-based drums will make you feel like you're actually in a real garage band.

To use the hi hat and kick drum, simply open your hand and trigger the gesture in each hand. And for the ultimate in realism, you can even hold actual drumsticks while you play!

changelog.change_log:
Added Metronome and Drum Pattern Overlays
Fixed bug with the Electric Drum Kit

Velocity-based drum hits
Reduced drum wobble
Added electric drum kit
Added Gamepad, Midi Keyboard, QWERTY Keyboard, and Mouse Support
Drum hit velocity now affects the volume

- Vastly Improved Latency
 - Added Double Kick Option
 - Added Fancy Text

New Environments
 - Passthrough mode - play in your own living room.
 - Void mode - for improved performance
 - Stage environment - play on a concert hall

Performance Improvements
 - Improved battery life
 - Improved performance for Quest 1 & 2

- Hand Tracking v2.1 Support
 - Shader Optimizations
 - Stable 90 FPS on Quest 2

- Added Controller Support
 - Optimized Audio Files
 - Minor Graphics Updates
Increased rate of physics. Fixed aliasing on objects.
v0.22 - Removed Cube Knuckles, Move Right Cymbal, Prevent Double Hit, Cymbals now multi-directional, gestures easier to trigger.
